text:
I would like to issue a statement broadly denouncing the evils of this world.

Among them, racism, bigotry, feminism, and also caffeine free Pepsi.

Thank you, I'll take my Likes and Retweets now.

NDZ says tobacco ban is rational because smoking burdens the health care system. Whilst it is in order to allow alcohol which has seen hospital emergency rooms swamped? This is as rational as banning Fanta but allowing Pepsi. It is sheer spite. Malicious and obdurate crap.

The workers at Varun Beverages (Pepsi) are demonstrating over unfair labour practices today in Harare.

Amongst their grievances are sexual harassment and abuse, racism and poor wages.

This is the second day of demonstrations at this company which manufactures Pepsi-Cola. https://t.co/jAeL8xi7RZ

At a time when all eyes are turned on the social and health inequities of people of color, a new study sheds light on how soda companies target minority youth with advertising dollars. https://t.co/EF7LSskAst

Ok I might have to start protesting this stay at home order, I have about $150 in empty soda cans taking up residence in my house.

The dude at Mcdonalds asked what drink I wanted with my meal and I asked for a Pepsi. He told me they only served coke. 

I finally understand the pain that cop felt

Just like a TV will run a Coca Cola Ad in the morning and also run a Pepsi one in the evening..
